LanguageData.SimpleStimpack.label: Stimulator
LanguageData.SimpleStimpack.description: A disposable gray syringe with a pressure gauge. Contains a red liquid made from blood and antiseptic.
LanguageData.RadAway.label: Anti-radin
LanguageData.RadAway.description: It is a polymer container with a short tube filled with a transparent yellow-orange infusion solution. The solution is capable of luminescence in the dark. The label has handwritten words "Rad Away" and illegible traces of factory markings.
